SELECT ic.comment_level as commentLevel, ic.content, ic.sepc_name as specName, ic.created_time as createdTime, u.face as userFace, u.nickname FROM items_comments ic left join users u on ic.user_id = u.id where ic.item_id = #{paramMap.itemId}
and ic.comment_level = #{paramMap.level}

SELECT i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount as price FROM items i left join items_img ii on i.id = ii.item_id left join ( select item_id, min(price_discount) as price_discount from items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) as tempSpec on i.id = tempSpec.item_id where ii.is_main = 1
and i.item_name like '%${paramMap.keywords}%'
order by
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc

SELECT i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount as price FROM items i left join items_img ii on i.id = ii.item_id left join ( select item_id, min(price_discount) as price_discount from items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) as tempSpec on i.id = tempSpec.item_id where ii.is_main = 1 and i.cat_id = #{paramMap.catId} order by
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc

SELECT i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, img.url as itemImgUrl, spec.id as specId, spec.name as specName, spec.price_discount as priceDiscount, spec.price_normal as priceNormal FROM items_spec spec LEFT JOIN items i ON spec.item_id = i.id LEFT JOIN items_img img ON spec.item_id = img.item_id where img.is_main = 1 and spec.id in
#{specId}
